forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address below and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
errorNetwork: Network Error. Please check your connection and try again.
errorDefault: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errorValidEmail: Email must be a valid email address.
errorEmptyEmailPassword: Email and password cannot be empty.
errorTooManyRequest: Too many requests, please try again later.
errorUserEmailExists: A user with this email already exists.
errorUserUsernameExists: A user with this username already exists.
errorPasswordTooWeak: Password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
errorUsernameTooLong: Username must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 30 characters.
resetPasswordDescription: Enter a new password for your account.
passwordChangedSuccessfully: Your password has been changed successfully!
verificationFailedDescription: We couldn't verify your email. The link may be invalid or expired.
emailAlreadyVerified: Email is already verified. You can now continue.
removeFromFriends1: Are you sure you want to remove
requiredPermissionsCameraMessage: The app requires access to the camera for proper functionality. Please check the permissions in your device settings.
requiredPermissionsStorageMessage: The app requires access to storage to save and load files. Please check the permissions in your device settings.
showBankAccountNumberTip: The bank account number is used to generate QR payments. For Czech or Slovak bank accounts, you can enter the account in the standard format: prefix–account number/bank code. Users from other countries should enter their account in IBAN format. The required account format depends on the country selected when entering your details.
showBankAccountNumberDescription: Enter your password to verify your identity and view the protected bank account number.
showIbanDescription: Enter your password to verify your identity and view the protected IBAN.
invalidBankAccountFormat: Invalid bank account number format, e.g. 19-1234567890/0800
unsavedChangesMessage: Are you sure you want to discard unsaved changes?
errorBankNumberNeedCountry: If you enter a bank account number or IBAN, you must also select the bank account country.
errorName: The first name can be up to 40 characters long.
errorSurname: The last name can be up to 40 characters long.
errorBirthDateInFuture: The date of birth must be between the year 1920 and the present.
errorBankNumberInvalid: Invalid bank account number or IBAN.
errorGender: Gender must be selected from the available options.
errorCountry: Country must be selected from the available options.
